document.full_text: russia has delayed this month's launch of a soyuz capsule that is to carry u.s. and russian astronauts to the international space station (iss) due to technical problems, the russian space agency said on monday.
document.title: russia delays soyuz flight to space station
lines_and_colors: russia has delayed this month's launch of a soyuz capsule that is to carry u.s. and russian astronauts to the international space station (iss) due to technical problems, the russian space agency said on monday.
